attributes.action: To avoid funding being cut for Olympic Sports in the run up to London 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is widely reported that there is a threat to the fudning for Athletes training for 2012. If we want to repeat oe even have a better medal haul in 2012 then a cut to funding which has been promised but which is under threat.

It has been due to Lottery funding and more that our atheletes have increasingly done better and better since 1996. It would be a travesty if we did not excel in London 2012 amd it would be an embarrasment, and is Funding that is promised should be kept.
